body:
Hi Grasshope,



While I didn't write that component myself. You need the RhinoCommon Mesh.CreateFromBrep method 

search for it in the RhinoCommon - [http://4.rhino3d.com/5/rhinocommon/](http://4.rhino3d.com/5/rhinocommon/)









[http://4.rhino3d.com/5/rhinocommon/](http://4.rhino3d.com/5/rhinocommon/)
